imageResolution.rangeTooltip: Controls detail in pixels: higher means clearer, lower means more pixelated.
imageResolution.buttonTooltip: Removes image files from the document to get smaller file size or keep images as it is in the pdf.

heroSection.title: Compress PDF Files Without Losing Quality
heroSection.subtitle: Reduce Size, Not the Quality

sectionOne.title: What is a PDF Compressor?
sectionOne.description: A PDF compression tool is a software application designed to reduce the file size of PDF documents. This process involves optimizing the contents of the PDF, such as images and fonts, to decrease the overall file size while maintaining as much quality as possible. PDF compression tools are essential for managing large files, improving upload/download speeds, and conserving storage space.
sectionOne.imageAlt: Illustration of what a PDF compressor is.

sectionTwo.title: Why Use Our PDF Compression Tool?
sectionTwo.description: Our PDF compression tool stands out for its efficiency and user-friendly design. Here are a few reasons to choose our tool:

features.featureDescription: Customize your PDF files with various compression levels, image qualities, color settings, and additional options.
Compress your PDF files to a manageable size for easier sharing and storage, ensuring convenience and efficiency.
Compress multiple PDF files simultaneously for added convenience and streamline your document management process.
Compress files in seconds to save time and effort, making your document management faster and more efficient.
Upload files from cloud storage, URLs or local drives with drag & drop. Save them to your preferred locations easily.
Preview and print compressed PDF files directly for enhanced convenience, making document handling quicker & easier.

sectionThree.title: How to Reduce PDF File Size Online?

stepOne.stepTitle: Upload Your Files Directly to the Web
stepOne.stepDescription: Our tool allows you to upload files using 6 methods: local storage, drag & drop, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and URL. Once uploaded, you'll be redirected to the customization page.
stepOne.imageAlt: File upload options, including URL pasting and drag-and-drop, with a highlighted user interface for uploading documents.

stepTwo.stepDescription: Our tool lets you customize files by adjusting compression (extreme, medium, less), image settings (brightness, contrast, color), resolution, and color mode (color or B&W). You can also remove images, rotate pages, add or remove files, and sort by size or alphabetically. Click to start compression.
stepTwo.imageAlt: PDF customization options, including image resolution, file adjustments, and compression levels, with a 'before and after' comparison of file sizes.

stepThree.stepTitle: Download, Share, and Manage Compressed Files
stepThree.stepDescription: Download files individually or as a zip, and save to Dropbox, OneDrive, or Google Drive. Share via Facebook, LinkedIn, Gmail, Twitter, or QR code/URL link. Edit names, delete files, print with settings (copies, paper size, orientation), and preview for quality.
stepThree.imageAlt: File download interface showing a titled PDF and its progress bar.

questions.question: Will Compressing My PDF Affect Its Quality?
questions.answer: Our tool is designed to minimize quality loss while reducing file size. You can choose from different compression levels to suit your needs.

questions.question: Is My Data Safe After Compressing the PDF Files?
questions.answer: Yes, your files are deleted from our servers after processing. We prioritize your privacy and data security.

questions.question: Can I Compress PDFs on My Mobile Device?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Our tool is fully responsive and works seamlessly on mobile devices and tablets.

questions.question: Can I Compress a Password-protected PDF File?
questions.answer: To compress a password-protected PDF file, you first need to remove the password protection. Once the PDF is unprotected, you can upload it to our tool and compress it easily.

questions.question: How do I Customize My PDF Files Before Compression?
questions.answer: You can customize your PDFs by rotating pages, adjusting image enhancement and resolution sliders, changing color scopes, selecting whether to keep or discard images, and adjusting the compression level.

questions.question: What Are the Output Options After Compression?
questions.answer: After compression, you can download all files in a zip format, save them to Dropbox, OneDrive, or Google Drive, delete individual files, preview the compressed PDFs, print them, share them across platforms, or go back to the customization page.

about.heading: About Compress PDF
about.description: Welcome to Online Compress PDF, your go-to solution for efficient and high-quality PDF compression. Whether you're a professional handling large reports, a student submitting assignments, or a small business owner archiving documents, we are here to simplify your PDF management process.

sectionOne.title: What is Our Mission?
sectionOne.description: At Compress PDF, our mission is to simplify the management of PDF files by providing a user-friendly and efficient tool for compressing PDFs. We understand that large PDF files can be cumbersome, whether you're sharing documents via email, uploading to websites, or simply trying to save storage space. Our goal is to offer a seamless, accessible solution that enhances your productivity and convenience, allowing you to handle your PDF files with ease.

sectionTwo.title: What Do We Offer?
sectionTwo.description: We offer a comprehensive suite of features designed to meet all your PDF compression needs:

items.title: Multiple Upload Systems
items.description: Easily upload your files from your device, cloud storage, or drag-and-drop directly onto our platform.

items.title: Flexible Download Methods
items.description: Once your PDF is compressed, download it through various options tailored to your preferences.

items.title: Online Sharing and Printing
items.description: Share your compressed PDFs directly through email or social media and print them with just a few clicks.

items.title: Customization Features
items.description: Adjust compression settings to balance quality and file size according to your specific requirements.

sectionThree.title: Our Team Members
sectionThree.description: Our team is a diverse group of dedicated professionals passionate about technology and user experience. From software developers and designers to customer support specialists, each member brings expertise and enthusiasm to the table. We are committed to continually improving our tool and ensuring it meets your needs with the highest standards of performance and reliability.

sectionFour.title: Why Choose Us?
sectionFour.description: Choosing Compress PDF means opting for a reliable, intuitive, and cost-free solution to your PDF compression needs. Hereâs why we stand out:

items.title: Ease of Use
items.description: Our platform is designed with simplicity in mind, making it accessible to everyone, regardless of technical skill.

items.title: Customizable Options
items.description: Tailor the compression settings to your preferences to maintain the quality of your documents while reducing their size.

items.title: Fast and Efficient
items.description: Experience quick processing times and high-quality results with our advanced compression technology.

items.title: Secure and Reliable
items.description: Your files are handled with the utmost care, ensuring your data remains private and secure.
